name: Spicy Corn Salad
author: 5280cook
summary: Everyone's favorite dish on the buffet table, this simple corn salad is perfect with everything. Barbeque, baked ham, sandwiches, anything is complemented by this delicious side. Print out the recipe in advance because you're going to get a lot of requests.
ingredients: ⅓ medium red bell pepper, diced
½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
8 ounces chili cheese-flavored corn chips (such as Fritos®)
directions: Place corn, green onions, red bell pepper, serrano pepper, Cheddar cheese, cilantro, bacon bits, mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic powder, salt, and pepper into a medium-sized bowl
Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve, at least 1 hour
Stir in corn chips just before serving
